languages.text: {n}Жар в воздухе рассеивается, и старик устало опускает руки.{/n} "Хорошо. Спасите... спасите наше священное Дитя. Доставьте его в Простор Кононус Регенту Ааронто, нынешнему главе Дома Орселлио. Можете быть уверены — награда за спасение будет достойна ваших усилий".

traits.locale_text: {n}Жар в воздухе рассеивается, и старик устало опускает руки.{/n} "Хорошо. Спасите... спасите наше священнное Дитя. Доставье его в Простор Кононус Регенту Ааронто, нынешнему главе Дома Орселлио. Можете быть уверены — награда за спасение будет достойна ваших усилий".

languages.text: {n}The heat in the air dissipates and the old man lowers his arms wearily.{/n} "All right. Save... Save our sacred Child, Deliver her safely to Regent Aaronto, acting head of House Orsellio, in the Koronus Expanse. Rest assured that the reward will be worth your effort."
languages.original_text: {n}Жар в воздухе рассеивается, и старик устало опускает руки.{/n} "Хорошо. Спасите... спасите наше священное Дитя. Доставьте его в Простор Кононус Регенту Ааронто, нынешнему главе Дома Орселлио. Можете быть уверены — награда за спасение будет достойна ваших усилий".

traits.locale_text: {n}The heat in the air dissipates and the old man lowers his arms wearily.{/n} "All right. Save... Save our sacred Child, Deliver her safely to Regent Aaronto, acting head of House Orsellio, in the Koronus Expanse. Rest assured that the reward will be worth your effort."

{n}The heat in the air dissipates and the old man lowers his arms wearily.{/n} "All right. Save... Save our sacred Child, Deliver her safely to Regent Aaronto, acting head of House Orsellio, in the Koronus Expanse. Rest assured that the reward will be worth your effort."

{n}The heat in the air dissipates and the old man lowers his arms wearily.{/n} "All right. Save... Save our sacred Child, Deliver her safely to Regent Aaronto, acting head of House Orsellio, in the Koronus Expanse. Rest assured that the reward will be worth your effort."

{n}The heat in the air dissipates and the old man lowers his arms wearily.{/n} "All right. Save... Save our sacred Child, Deliver her safely to Regent Aaronto, acting head of House Orsellio, in the Koronus Expanse. Rest assured that the reward will be worth your effort."

languages.text: {n}热气消散了，老人疲惫地放下了手臂。{/n}“好吧，救……救救我们的圣子，把她安全地带到阿伦托摄政王那里。他是奥赛罗家族在科罗努斯扩区的代理领导人。放心吧，你的付出必将得到合适的回报。”
languages.original_text: {n}The heat in the air dissipates and the old man lowers his arms wearily.{/n} "All right. Save... Save our sacred Child, Deliver her safely to Regent Aaronto, acting head of House Orsellio, in the Koronus Expanse. Rest assured that the reward will be worth your effort."

traits.locale_text: {n}热气消散了，老人疲惫地放下了手臂。{/n}“好吧，救……救救我们的圣子，把她安全地带到阿伦托摄政王那里。他是奥塞罗家族在科罗努斯扩区的代理领导人。放心吧，你的付出必将得到合适的回报。”

languages.text: {n}El calor en el aire se disipa y el anciano baja los brazos, agotado.{/n} «De acuerdo. Salve... salve a nuestra niña sagrada, entréguela a salvo al regente Aaronto, líder en funciones de la casa Orsellio, en la Extensión de Koronus. Le aseguro que la recompensa merecerá la pena».
languages.original_text: {n}The heat in the air dissipates and the old man lowers his arms wearily.{/n} "All right. Save... Save our sacred Child, Deliver her safely to Regent Aaronto, acting head of House Orsellio, in the Koronus Expanse. Rest assured that the reward will be worth your effort."

traits.locale_text: {n}El calor en el aire se disipa y el anciano baja los brazos, agotado.{/n} «De acuerdo. Salve... salve a nuestra niña sagrada, entréguela a salvo al regente Aaronto, líder en funciones de la casa Orsellio, en la Extensión de Koronus. Le aseguro que la recompensa merecerá la pena».

languages.text: {n}老人は疲れたように腕を下ろした。{/n}「わかった。救ってくれ…聖なる我が『子ども』を無事に、コロヌス・エクスパンスにいるオーセリオ家当主代理のアーロント摂政に届けてくれ。安心してくれ、その努力に見合うだけの報酬は渡そう」
languages.original_text: {n}The heat in the air dissipates and the old man lowers his arms wearily.{/n} "All right. Save... Save our sacred Child, Deliver her safely to Regent Aaronto, acting head of House Orsellio, in the Koronus Expanse. Rest assured that the reward will be worth your effort."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人は疲れたように腕を下ろした。{/n}「わかった。救ってくれ…聖なる我が『子ども』を無事に、コロヌス・エクスパンスにいるオーセリオ家当主代理のアーロント摂政に届けてくれ。安心してくれ、その努力に見合うだけの報酬は渡そう」

languages.text: {n}Die Hitze in der Luft löst sich auf, und der alte Mann senkt erschöpft die Arme.{/n} "Also gut. Rettet ... rettet das Kind, bringt sie sicher zu Regent Aaronto, dem kommissarischen Leiter des Hauses Orsellio in der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Seid versichert, die Belohnung wird Eure Mühe ausgleichen."
languages.original_text: {n}The heat in the air dissipates and the old man lowers his arms wearily.{/n} "All right. Save... Save our sacred Child, Deliver her safely to Regent Aaronto, acting head of House Orsellio, in the Koronus Expanse. Rest assured that the reward will be worth your effort."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Hitze in der Luft löst sich auf, und der alte Mann senkt erschöpft die Arme.{/n} "Also gut. Rettet ... rettet das Kind, bringt sie sicher zu Regent Aaronto, dem kommissarischen Leiter des Hauses Orsellio in der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Seid versichert, die Belohnung wird Eure Mühe ausgleichen."

languages.text: {n}La chaleur ambiante se dissipe et le vieil homme baisse les bras avec lassitude.{/n} « Très bien. Sauvez... Sauvez notre Enfant sacrée et conduisez-la saine et sauve au régent Aaronto, qui dirige provisoirement la maison Orsellio dans les Étendues de Koronus. Soyez {mf|assuré|assurée} que la récompense sera à la hauteur de vos efforts. »
languages.original_text: {n}The heat in the air dissipates and the old man lowers his arms wearily.{/n} "All right. Save... Save our sacred Child, Deliver her safely to Regent Aaronto, acting head of House Orsellio, in the Koronus Expanse. Rest assured that the reward will be worth your effort."

traits.locale_text: {n}La chaleur ambiante se dissipe et le vieil homme baisse les bras avec lassitude.{/n} « Très bien. Sauvez... Sauvez notre Enfant sacrée et conduisez-la saine et sauve au régent Aaronto, qui dirige provisoirement la maison Orsellio dans les Étendues de Koronus. Soyez {mf|assuré|assurée} que la récompense sera à la hauteur de vos efforts. »

languages.text: {n}Havadaki bunaltıcı sıcak dağılıyor ve ihtiyar adam kollarını bitkin bir şekilde indiriyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. Kutsal Çocuk'umuzu kurtar. Onu Orsellio Hanesi'nin Koronus Enginliği'ndeki vekil lideri Naip Aaronto'ya sağ salim teslim et. Merak etme, çabalarına layık bir ödül elde edeceksin."
languages.original_text: {n}The heat in the air dissipates and the old man lowers his arms wearily.{/n} "All right. Save... Save our sacred Child, Deliver her safely to Regent Aaronto, acting head of House Orsellio, in the Koronus Expanse. Rest assured that the reward will be worth your effort."

Onu Orsellio Hanesi'nin Koronus Enginliği'ndeki vekil lideri Naip Aaronto'ya sağ salim teslim et. Merak etme, çabalarına layık bir ödül elde edeceksin."
